mapper.select: SELECT /* ProductStatus.xml, selectParentProductStatus, SAC : 정희원 , 2014-02-17 */ PAPP.PROD_ID as "parentChannelId", TP.PROD_STATUS_CD as "parentStatus" FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RS INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD PAPP ON PAPP.PROD_ID = RS.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP ON TP.PROD_ID = RS.PROD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND RS.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010801' AND RS.PART_PROD_ID = #{partProdId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
